description: New Hubble Space Telescope observations have upended decades of expectations about Uranus’ moons. Scientists once thought the planet’s magnetic field darkened their backsides with radiation, but the latest data shows Titania and Oberon are collecting space dust on their leading sides instead. This “cosmic bug splatter” effect suggests dust from Uranus’ outer moons is drifting inward, covering the moons like a slow space car wash. It’s a surprising discovery that sheds light on the strange and dusty dynamics of the Uranian system.
title: Hubble Finds Cosmic Dust Coating Uranus’ Moons, Not Radiation Scars

description: Mokshapatam is a crime thriller starring Pooja Kiran, streaming now on Aha. Directed by Rahul Vanaja Rajeshwar, the film follows a single mother entangled in dangerous secrets. With strong performances and emotional tension, it’s a must-watch for Telugu thriller fans.
title: Mokshapatam Hindi OTT Release: Where to Watch it Online?

description: A new black hole theory proposes a fix to the long-standing singularity paradox by modifying gravity equations. But scientists like Nikodem Poplawski argue that the model lacks observational support and rests on speculative assumptions. He suggests future data from gravitational waves or the cosmic microwave background may one day help us uncover the true nature of black holes.
title: New Theory Challenges Black Hole Singularities, But Critics Raise Red Flags

description: In a historic first, ESA’s Solar Orbiter has imaged the Sun’s elusive south pole, exposing a tangle of magnetic fields and solar winds. The mission marks a major leap in understanding space weather and the 11-year solar cycle that influences Earth’s environment.
title: Solar Orbiter Captures First-Ever Close-Up of Sun’s South Pole, Revealing Magnetic Field Chaos

description: Stellar Blade launched on PC on June 11 and has since gone on to become a hit on the platform. On Steam, it's become Sony's biggest single-player launch in history. The game has also crossed a peak of over 183,000 concurrent players.
title: Stellar Blade Becomes Sony's Biggest Single-Player Steam Launch Ever a Day After PC Release

description: The Summer I Turned Pretty Season 3 drops on June 17, 2025, exclusively on Amazon Prime Video. Packed with love triangles, emotional flashbacks, and a moving farewell to Cousins Beach, this final season promises closure and nostalgia for fans of the hit teen drama.
title: The Summer I Turned Pretty Season 3 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Final Season Online?

description: Netflix’s Titan: The OceanGate Disaster explores the 2023 tragedy that shocked the world. Through expert interviews and rare footage, it traces how ambition and ignored warnings led to the submersible’s fatal implosion.
title: Titan: The OceanGate Disaster Now Streaming on Netflix: What You Need to Know

description: Amazon has nearly doubled the ad load on Prime Video, increasing it from about two or three minutes to four to six minutes per hour, according to a new report. While this expands ad space and lowers CPM, it may disrupt the viewing experience. Amazon reportedly informed investors but has yet to publicly acknowledge the change. The increased ad load, however, remains lower than traditional TV and some OTT rivals.
title: Amazon Prime Video Now Shows Twice As Much Ads As Before: Report

description: Brazil's Supreme Court ruled Wednesday that social media firms are responsible for certain user-posted content in the country. This could result in fines against social media companies in Brazil. The decision could impact the business of platforms including Meta's Facebook and Instagram, as well as TikTok, Elon Musk's X and other internet giants, such as Alphabet's Google, in a market of over 200 million people.
title: Brazil's Top Court Votes to Hold Social Media Platforms Accountable for User Posts

description: The CBI on Wednesday said it has arrested a person as part of a crackdown on a cybercrime racket. Cryptocurrencies worth Rs. 2.8 crore along with unaccounted cash amounting to Rs. 22 lakh were seized from the possession of the accused, Rahul Arora.
title: CBI Arrests Cyber Criminal, Seizes Cryptocurrencies Worth Rs. 2.8 Crore

description: With September just a few months away, all eyes are on Apple to announce its newest iPhone 17 series. This year’s lineup is expected to add one new model in the form of the iPhone 17 Air, which is said to offer a slim design. The 17 Air will likely compete with Samsung’s recently launched Galaxy S25 Edge. Going by the latest leak, it also seems that Apple is planning a sizable performance jump with its upcoming chipset that will power its iPhone 17 Pro series.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Series Allegedly Listed on Geekbench; Scores Higher Than Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC

description: Microsoft 365 Copilot, the enterprise-focused artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot that works across Office apps, is vulnerable to a zero-click vulnerability. As per a cybersecurity firm, a flaw existed in the chatbot that could be triggered via a simple text email to hack into it. Once the chatbot was hacked, it could then be made to retrieve sensitive information from the user’s device and share it with the attacker.
title: Microsoft 365 Copilot Vulnerable to Zero-Click EchoLeak Exploit, Cybersecurity Researchers Say

description: OnePlus 13 will be the official smartphone partner and title sponsor for Season 4 of the Battlegrounds Mobile India Masters Series (BGMS), in collaboration with Nodwin Gaming. Launched earlier this year as the company's latest flagship, the OnePlus 13 will be exclusively used for all matches in the upcoming BGMI tournament.
title: OnePlus 13 to Be Used for All BGMI Matches at Upcoming BGMS 2025 Tournament

description: Samsung may be preparing to launch two new wireless earbuds, as per recent leaks. Ahead of official confirmation, the Galaxy Buds Core and Galaxy Buds 3 FE names have been reportedly found in an APK teardown of the latest Galaxy Buds Controller app for Wear OS. The Galaxy Buds Core could succeed the Galaxy Buds FE.
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds Core, Buds 3 FE Surface in Galaxy Buds Controller App: Report

description: Samsung has rolled out the One UI 8 beta 2 update for the Galaxy S25 series in select countries, including Germany and India, as per several reports online. The update is said to bring various improvements, bug fixes, and a new feedback option aimed at boosting interpreter performance. Interested users can register for the Android 16-based One UI 8 beta through the Samsung Members app.
title: Samsung Rolls Out One UI 8 Beta 2 Update for Galaxy S25 Series in Select Countries

description: Apple is reportedly planning to add a new app discoverability feature to the App Store. As per the report, the feature was first revealed in a developer-focused session at the WWDC 2025. Dubbed App Store Tags, it uses AI models to create new labels based on the features and functionalities of apps. The models pick the information from the app listing page.
title: Apple to Reportedly Use AI-Powered Tags to Improve App Discoverability on the App Store

description: A liquid oxygen (LOx) leak detected in SpaceX’s Falcon 9 rocket has led to the fourth delay of the Axiom-4 mission, which includes Indian astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla. Identified during a static fire test, the leak has paused launch plans as engineers work on repairs and safety checks, with a new launch date yet to be confirmed.
title: Axiom-4 Mission Carrying Indian Astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla Reportedly Delayed Due to LOx Leak

description: Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G is now up for sale through Infinix's official store and Flipkart in the country. Shoppers can avail an instant discount of Rs. 2,000 when purchasing the handset using ICICI bank cards or an exchange discount on the first day of the sale. It runs on a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate chipset and has a new Cyber Mecha Design 2.0. It boasts a 5,500mAh battery that supports 45W wired charging.
title: Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G Now Available for Purchase in India: Price, Specifications, Offers

description: Nintendo Switch 2 is closer to the Xbox Series S than PS4 in terms of raw computing power, developer Koei Tecmo has said. The studio is gearing up to launch Wild Hearts S on the Switch 2 next month.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Closer to Xbox Series S Than PS4 in Power, Says Koei Tecmo

description: Nothing Phone 3 will be manufactured in India, just like the Nothing Phone 2 and Phone 3a, according to the company. The company has also given users an early look at the handset's design and confirmed its model number ahead of its debut in India and global markets.
title: Nothing Phone 3 to Be Manufactured in India, Company Reveals Portion of Rear Panel With Model Number

description: Sony has announced discount offers on several of its audio products in India to celebrate World Music Day, observed globally on June 21. The special prices will be valid from June 13 to June 22 via Sony's stores, website and other offline and online channels. Products ranging from true wireless stereo earphones and headphones to party speakers and soundbars will be available at considerably lowered rates.
title: Sony Announces Limited-Period Discount on Audio Products in India for World Music Day

description: Walt Disney and Comcast's Universal filed a copyright lawsuit against Midjourney on Wednesday. The suit claims Midjourney pirated the libraries of the two Hollywood studios, making and distributing without permission "innumerable" copies of characters such as Darth Vader from "Star Wars," Elsa from "Frozen," and the Minions from "Despicable Me".
title: Disney, Universal Sue Image Creator Midjourney for Copyright Infringement

description: OnePlus 13s was launched in India earlier this month and goes on sale today. With bank offers, it can be purchased at the lowest effective prices of Rs. 49,999 and Rs. 54,999 for the 256GB and 512GB variants. The phone comes with a flagship-level Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC paired with 12GB of RAM, a customisable Plus Key and a compact 6.32-inch 1.5K LTPO display.
title: OnePlus 13s Sale Starts Today in India: Check Price, Discount, Bank Offers and More

description: OnePlus Nord 5 surfaced on the Geekbench website with Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 SoC, paired with 12GB of RAM. It was rumoured to come with a MediaTek Dimensity 9400e chipset. The listing suggests the Android 15 operating system as well.
title: OnePlus Nord 5 Allegedly Visits Geekbench With Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 SoC, 12GB of RAM

description: Poco F7 has appeared on Geekbench, revealing key specifications ahead of its launch. The listing confirms that the Poco F7 will feature a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC and 12GB of RAM. A microsite has revealed the phone will go on sale via Flipkart, and earlier reports have revealed additional specifications of the Poco F7.
title: Poco F7 With Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC Surfaces on Geekbench After Company Hints at Imminent Launch

description: Sony has announced the slate of games joining PS Plus Game Catalog in June. Games joining the service this month include co-op shooter FBC: Firebreak, military shooter Battlefield 2042, horror title Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted 2, hunting sim theHunter: Call of the Wild, and more.
title: PS Plus Game Catalog June Titles Announced: FBC: Firebreak, Battlefield 2042 and More

description: Realme Narzo 80 Lite 5G will launch in India on June 16. The phone is teased to come in black and purple colourways, and it will be available via Amazon. It is confirmed to pack a 6,000mAh battery and have a 7.94mm profile. The handset will come with a military-grade MIL-STD-810H durability certification as well. It will likely join the Realme Narzo 80x and Narzo 80 Pro variants in the country.
title: Realme Narzo 80 Lite 5G India Launch Date Set for June 16

description: Truecaller is introducing a new feature dubbed Secure Calls. The feature is available to Truecaller for Business subscribers and lets these enterprises confirm the authenticity of each outgoing call using backend processes. Once verified, the receiver of the call sees a verified badge. The company says the feature will reduce call spoofing.
title: Truecaller Introduces Secure Calls for Businesses, Aimed at Protecting Users from Online Scams

description: US senators Elizabeth Warren and Richard Blumenthal have asked Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg to clarify whether the company intends to launch its stablecoin. The letter to Meta, dated June 11, follows a recent Fortune report that claimed the company is exploring stablecoins to facilitate cost-effective cross-border payouts.
title: US Senators Seek Details on Meta's Stablecoin Plans as GENIUS Act Stands Close to Approval

description: iQOO Z10 Lite 5G is set to launch in India next week, and the phone's battery specifications have now been revealed. The upcoming iQOO Z10 Lite 5G will feature a 6nm octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset with 5G connectivity, along with a 50-megapixel primary camera, and a 5-megapixel selfie camera.
title: iQOO Z10 Lite 5G Battery Capacity Confirmed Ahead of India Launch, to Be Powered By Dimensity 6300 SoC

description: Red Magic Gaming Tablet 3 Pro launched in China in two colour options with a 9.06-inch OLED display with 2.4K resolution. The tablet runs on the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and houses an 8,200mAh battery with 80W fast charging support. It has a 13-megapixel rear camera and a 9-megapixel selfie shooter.
title: Red Magic Gaming Tablet 3 Pro With Snapdragon 8 Elite, Up to 24GB RAM Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung is rolling out a new update for its 2025 series of Bespoke Smart Refrigerators. This update adds two new features — Voice ID and a new way to summon Bixby. The former can recognise users by their registered voice and show their account-specific data. And the latter allows users to double-tap a turned-off screen on the appliance to activate the AI assistant.
title: Samsung Bespoke Smart Refrigerators Get a New Personalisation-Focused Voice ID Feature

description: Bitget’s 2025 Anti-Scam Research Report estimates that global crypto scams led to losses of $4.6 billion (roughly Rs. 39,364 crore) in 2024. CEO Gracy Chen noted that AI has made these scams faster, cheaper, and more difficult to detect.
title: Crypto Scams Cost Investors $4.6 Billion in 2024, Social Engineering Attacks Surge: Bitget

description: Google's Pixel 10 series will reportedly feature Qi2 wireless charging support with built-in magnets. This could enable Google to launch a new line of Pixelsnap branded magnetic accessories, just like Apple's MagSafe ecosystem introduced with the iPhone 12.
title: Google Pixel 10 to Introduce 'Pixelsnap' Accessories Alongside Qi 2.2 Support: Report

description: Meta is rolling out a new artificial intelligence (AI) video editing tool in the US and a dozen more countries across the world. On Wednesday, the Menlo Park-based tech giant announced that more than 50 preset AI prompts were being added to the Meta AI app, Meta.AI website, and the new Edits app, and they can change various aspects of a video.
title: Meta Is Rolling Out a Template-Style Generative AI-Powered Video Editing Tool

description: Realme 15 Pro is reportedly in development, although the company has not officially confirmed its existence. A new leak, however, suggests the handset could launch in three colour options in India and may offer configurations with up to 12GB of RAM and up to 512GB of storage.
title: Realme 15 Pro to Launch in India in Four RAM and Storage Configurations, Three Colour Options: Report

description: Vivo X Fold 5 will launch in China on June 25. Pre-orders for the handset is live in the country. It will be available in green, titanium, and white colour options. The phone will likely carry a Zeiss-backed triple rear camera unit. It is claimed to be the first Android smartphone to be able to connect directly to Apple's iCloud. The Vivo X Fold 5 will support being used as an external display on a MacBook. It will support AirPods pairing as well.
title: Vivo X Fold 5 Launch Date Set for June 25; Design, Colour Options Revealed

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 is teased to come with improved AI and privacy features. The AI-backed camera is said to be more intuitive and could be able to process text-based and multimodal prompts. We may be introduced to one or more new Galaxy AI features that users can access directly from the camera app. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 will likely have a triple rear camera unit with a 200-megapixel main sensor.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 AI Camera Features Teased Ahead of Anticipated Launch
